column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We do apologize for the inconvenience. Having been open for 1.5 years at this location
column2: this is just the second time where we were forced to delay our opening due to forces that are out of our control.  Centerpoint located a major gas leak in the entire center and as a result shut off the gas to the whole building as they search and repair the leak.  As you my already know
column3: a gas leak is very serious.  We were notified of this at 10:45am and were told Centerpoint should have it resolved by 1pm.  Having our staff already inside the restaurant
column4: we put everyone on standby and will open the second the gas is turned on.
